subject: Coaches and Managers
Sports Injuries
Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: While nothing has been made official, Bill Parcells says he intends to remain retired, leaving New Orleans to consider Joe Vitt, the team’s assistant head coach, to fill in during Sean Payton’s season-long suspension.
snippet: While nothing has been made official, Bill Parcells says he intends to remain retired, leaving New Orleans to consider Joe Vitt, the team’s assistant head coach, to fill in during Sean Payton’s season-long suspension.
